        button {

        .food-option:hover {

        .food-option img {
            width: 80px;

        .food-info {

        .food-title {

        .food-desc {

        .header {

        }
        .header img {

        }
        @media (max-width: 600px) {

        if (isset($_POST['submit'])) {

            ];
            
            $price = $prices[$food][$size];
            $foodName = $foodNames[$food];
            $sizeName = $sizeNames[$size];
            
            echo "<div class='result'>";
            echo "<h2>تم اختيارك بنجاح!</h2>";

            echo "<p>الحجم: <strong>$sizeName</strong></p>";
